retrieval.storage.index

Class IndexMultiThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.index.Index
      • retrieval.storage.index.IndexMultiThread

  • public class IndexMultiThread
extends Index
    This class is a class for multithreaded index This implements a hight level index, it means that you can add pictures, delete pictures, get similar pictures...
